headline: Nike Returns to Amazon with Strategic Price Hikes
summary: Six years after exiting, Nike will relaunch on Amazon next week, pairing its return with targeted price increases to offset tariffs.

raw.headline: Nike Returns to Amazon with Strategic Price Hikes
raw.summary: Six years after exiting, Nike will relaunch on Amazon next week, pairing its return with targeted price increases to offset tariffs.

headline: Nike set to raise prices next week, plans to sell on Amazon again
summary: The footwear retailer will increase prices on apparel and equipment for adults between $2 and $10, while those priced between $100 and $150 will see a $5 hike, it said.  With the critical back-to-school shopping season approaching, Nike will not raise prices for children's products.  "We regularly evaluate our business and make pricing adjustments as part of our seasonal planning," Nike said.

"We regularly evaluate our business and make pricing adjustments as part of our seasonal planning," Nike said.

headline: RBC Lowers NIKE (NKE) Price Target to $65, Cites Inventory Concerns
summary: On May 20, RBC Capital analyst Piral Dadhania lowered his price target for NIKE, Inc. (NYSE:NKE) from $66 to $65, while maintaining a Sector Perform rating on the company’s shares. The adjustment was made in light of the athletic apparel giant’s ongoing efforts to manage excess inventory and prepare for the upcoming Autumn/Winter 2025 Running […]

headline: Sneaker Shock: Yes, Nike Is Raising Prices Too on Select Products Amid Trump’s Tariffs
